GapFillDragDrop.Instruction: Click on the correct word or phrase and drag it to the correct gap.

Content.Question:
1 I really dislike traffic jams.
2 She did try to find the model you asked for.
3 Those Italian suits are very, very expensive.
4 She is such a good teacher.
5 It was the cold weather that I wasn't expecting.
6 We do provide refunds to customers who keep their receipts.
7 I think Jennifer Lopez is just amazing.
8 It is his attitude that I find annoying.
9 Michael does cook dinner most evenings.
10 I am so excited about meeting Prince William.
